name: Running late (Breaddysticks, FunkyRuben, Poko)
description:
This game was made for Mini-Jam 69: Hell! 

Running Late is a game about a middle-aged demon named Dennas who is late for his job.

While running to the office, he gets a call from his boss: Satan.

Make sure your phone doesn't run out of call credit or he will fire you!

- Avoid obstacles.

- Collect Sim cards to prevent the call from ending.

- Enjoy over 50 different Dialogues from your boss.
